records.Name: To customer - Order__c.Status has changed
records.Description: Informing the customer about the change in the status of the Order__c object
records.Subject: Your order status has changed
records.HtmlValue:
Dear {{{Order__c.ShippingFirstName__c}}},

It is a pleasure to inform you that {{{Order__c.Name}}} order status has changed to {{{Order__c.Status__c}}}.

Best regards,
{{{Sender.Name}}}
